ing: salt and ground black pepper to taste
n: Chayote Squash With Red Peppers and Ginger
des: "This is a combination of several recipes I found. Thought it turned out well, so here it is. Great easy side dish with a little kick of spice."
ins: Heat a large skillet over medium heat, melt butter in the hot skillet, and stir chayotes, sugar, garlic, red pepper flakes, and ginger into butter. Cook, stirring frequently, until chayotes are tender, about 15 minutes; season with salt and black pepper.
